item.title: Here are Thursday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Microsoft, Roblox, Disney, Amazon, Deckers and more
item.description: Here are the biggest calls on Wall Street on Thursday.

item.title: This restaurant software stock gets a double upgrade from Wells Fargo
item.description: Wells Fargo sees shares of Toast rising 13% from here.

item.title: Morgan Stanley stands by Nvidia as a top pick even though tariff turmoil is not over
item.description: The firm remains bullish on sustained AI spending and said Nvidia's "relative supply chain flexibility will help them outperform."

item.title: Tesla gets price target cut from three Wall Street shops
item.description: Mizuho's price target cut still implies Tesla stock could rise 38% from here, while UBS' new forecast is roughly 30% below the stock's Wednesday close...

item.title: Buy the dip on 'ad tech's best executor,' Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Analyst Matthew Cost upgraded the mobile ad company to overweight from equal weight.
